title: I can't choose. Help!
body:
https://cdn3.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/7821917/Screen_Shot_2017_01_17_at_10.28.16_AM.png

Purple tails or White tails? I love the color purple, but I've got a thing for girls with black hair. They're all so good. Help me choose.

replies.body: I dont see any purple one.
I've bought the white one and it is better than I expected.
I went Pearl, I don't regret it, I'll get the others later this year when you can use IP on em.
